AboutMe.title: About me
AboutMe.body: I am a junior front-end developer working to become a full-stack developer with a passion for building visually appealing and user-friendly websites and applications. Strong technical proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind, React, and responsive design. Committed to staying updated on emerging technologies and industry trends to deliver innovative solutions. Seeking collaborations with forward-thinking professionals and organizations that value creativity and user-centric design.

Academic.title: Academic
Academic.major-foundations: Foundations in HTML, CSS and JavaScript

project-1.name: Pokedex
project-1.body: Pokedex app will show all pokemons available and their full information

project-2.name: User admin
project-2.body: This app allows to create, read, update and delete users (CRUD).

project-3.name: Rick and Morthy universe
project-3.body: App shows all universes from Rick and Morthy as well as all residents.

project-4.name: Weather app
project-4.body: This app gets current location and shows real time weather.

project-5.name: Fortune cookie
project-5.body: Get random quotes from different authors.

project-6.name: TO-DO app
project-6.body: App on which you can create, read, update and delete tasks from a list (CRUD)

project-7.name: Shopping cart
project-7.body: Shopping cart on which you can add, delete, update items from a shopping list.
